Which of the following saints popularised the Chisti order in Deccan?
1) Fasihuddin Baba Sanjal Khaksar
2) Burhanuddin Ianam
3) Gesu Daraz
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Due to the presence of Gesu Daraz in Gulbarga, the Chisti order was popularised in the Deccan. Fasihuddin Baba Sanjal Kha1csar and Burhanuddin Ianam were other saints of this line who promoted the order in the Deccan.
